definition: Suining county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
Suining county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan

sentences.english: A dialect called "Guanxia Pinghua" is spoken among Miao minority in Suining county of Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 湖南綏寧縣境內關峽苗族鄉流行一種“平話”。
